description: This requirement description contains the material requirements for Service Canada and its Passport program...
tags: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
full_summary:
**Tender Notice**

**Title / Title** 
Custom Labels

**Reference Number** 
WS3941522205-Doc4119495584

**Amendment Number**
2
**Solicitation Number** 
WS3941522205

**Tender Announcement Date** 
July 27, 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time** 
August 29, 2023, 14:00:00

**Expected Contract Start Date** 
April 30, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date** 
March 31, 2024

**Status of Tender**
Cancelled

**Branch of the Canadian Government**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**
Name: Wehbe, Amal (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: amal.wehbe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca


The requirements of this tender call for a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for the provision of custom labels. Service Canada will require these specialized products to meet the demands of the Passport program. The RSO tender will be closing on August 29, 2023.

The proposed contract is expected to commence on April 30, 2023, and end on March 31, 2024.

The estimated procurement value for this RSO Contract is approximately for *Printing materials. Goods and Services Category: SRV

Selection criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

The purchaser is Service Canada (ServCan), whose purchase requirements are as follows, which the bidder should be aware of when submitting your application:

- The purchaser will be purchasing self-adhesive labels.
- Each year, the purchaser has a recurring demand for the products at hand.
- The bidder’s service standards in regard to the release of goods to the purchaser must meet or exceed an average of 95 percent, on an annual basis.

The bidders are advised to bid in Canadian dollars, reference currency.

The tender can be accessed online on [the website mentioned in the original text] on the following terms: 

Submission of any documentation is not necessary, and adherence to the terms mentioned above is the responsibility of the bidders.

* Part No. : *82121500
* Description: *Printing
* Category: SRV

All bids submitted will be re-evaluated according to the selection criteria.

Contractors are expected to bid on their best possible competently prepared bid in accordance with the requirements of the RSO tender description presented in the
